topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559773be636872687e000cb3#post_559773be636872687e000cb3
[bq="PaskaNaakka"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559770d7636872020d001c29#post_559770d7636872020d001c29
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]
If you take down one member, there will be another one that will take the place again.[/bq]
Which is why you kill everyone in the area, burn everything to the ground and then return a few days later to finish off any surivors.[/bq]
You know cartels usually works in small villages right?
With innocent people, right?
And turning Mexico in Siria 2? No thanks


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559775556368726753001320#post_559775556368726753001320
[bq="uc9"]"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559773be636872687e000cb3#post_559773be636872687e000cb3
Or you could legalize it and require that businesses that create the drugs the employees have to have background checks and all be squeeky clean, regular police inspections often and that if any guns are found on the premises they lose their license and that sellers and distributors have to have medical licenses to do so?  Also have a semi-high tax rate that directly goes to rehab clinics; to give a equivalent semi-high tax alcohol and the money generated from those taxes goes to alcohol rehab.[/bq]
>legalized

Then all the sacrifice to defeat the cartels was in vain.
Fuck that.

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5597887c636872762e0013cc#post_5597887c636872762e0013cc
Not only is Fairy Tail the name of the manga, it's the name of the main Magic Guild in the series. A lot of the guilds in Fairy Tail follow the same naming conventions. Lamia Scale, Mermaid Heel, Raven Tail, Titan Nose and so on.
